remarks: Commutation is symmetric.  Theorem 2(v) in [Kalmbach] p. 22.  ( ~ cmcmi analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 7-Nov-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cmtcom.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cmtcom.c $e |- C = ( cm ` K ) $.
cmtcomN $p |- ( ( K e. OML /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X C Y <-> Y C X ) ) $.
